idea: This project aims to provide a new life to plastic waste and construction debris and reduce waste going into landfills for a sustainable future. The effort is to increase the consumption of discarded mixed wastes collected from organizations, societies, oceans and building material waste (debris) & recycling it into new raw material for new items & keeping a closed-loop into the material lifecycle, Therefore encouraging  circular economy and also providing a solution to support SDGs Goals, thus reducing the generation of new waste & provide a solution to existing landfills and ocean-bound plastic
